Sentencas: The development of cathodes with high catalytic activity and stability remains a critical challenge for the commercialization of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: In this study, a novel approach combining doping and surface modification was employed to enhance the catalytic activity and CO2 resistance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (PSCF) cathode.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: Initially, Ni was partially substituted for Fe in PSCF, resulting in the reduction of the average bond energy of metal-oxygen, thereby increasing oxygen vacancy concentration and electrochemical activity.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of PSCFN0.1 at 800 degrees C was found to be 0.025 ohm center dot cm(2), representing a 32.4 % reduction compared to PSCF.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: Subsequently, Pr(NO3)(3) solution was impregnated on the surface of the PSCFN0.1 using a spin-coating technique, resulting in the formation of a PrO2/PSCFN0.1 heterostructure that significantly improved the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) kinetics.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, the polarization resistance of PrO2-PSCFN0.1 was only 0.016 ohm center dot cm(2), a 56.8 % reduction compared to PSCF.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: Moreover, the peak power density of PrO2-PSCFN0.1 reached 1190 mW center dot cm(-2) at 800 degrees C, representing a substantial increase of 207.4 % compared to PSCF.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: Furthermore, PrO2-PSCFN0.1-based full cell exhibited excellent performance stability and CO2 resistance.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification

Sentencas: This work provides an effective strategy to explore novel cathodes for SOFCs.
Titulo: Enhancing ORR activity and CO2 tolerance of Pr0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ-based SOFC cathode through synergistic doping and surface modification
